subject: Subject

curriculum_comparison_description: Compare BUP and Cambridge curricula side-by-side. Click on modules to expand units, and units to see detailed subunits and subsections.
connections_description: Hover over any topic card to see its connections highlighted in the other curriculum. Connections show where topics overlap or complement each other.
summative_assessment_description: Plan and manage summative assessment tasks for this unit
curriculum_selector_description: Click on any module, unit, or subunit below to append it to your unit content. You can add individual items or entire sections at once.
no_curriculum_data_available: No curriculum data available for the selected grade/year
add_text_and_link: Add text to content and link to unit plan
link_only: Link to unit plan only (no text added)
